name: Football (itch) (Komerish)
description:
Football is a small local multiplayer game about kicking a ball until it's inside the goal. Play with up to 4 friends to see who can score the most. Currently there's only support for keyboard, but i might add controller support in the future. Have fun!

Controls:

  • P1 - WASD
  • P2 - Arrow keys
  • P3 - IJKL
  • P4 - TFGH
